duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a field crew to perform accurate and efficient field surveys for land development, transportation, utility, energy, and land surveying projects.
Perform ARDOT PSUR/DSUR, topographic surveys, ALTA and boundary surveys, and construction staking.
Utilize conventional, GPS, or terrestrial laser scanning methodology for surveys.
Ensure meticulous attention to detail and accuracy in surveying operations.
Follow written or verbal instructions and be able to lift 50 pounds and stand for long periods of time.
Start work at 7:30 AM CST, Monday through Friday, and be available for overnight travel up to 50%.
Work overtime and weekends as needed to meet project deadlines.
